constructionNotice: NOTE: This Website Is Under Construction. Check Back in April 2021.
noActiveSensor: Click a sensor on the map to see its AQI value here!
expandMap: Expand to see the sensor map
expandAqiGauge: Expand to see information about the selected sensor
expandAqiGraph: Expand to see a graph of the last 24 hours
hideMap: Compress to hide the sensor map
hideAqiGauge: Compress to hide information about the selected sensor
hideAqiGraph: Compress to hide the graph of the last 24 hours
